descriptionlist.description:
BigSurExpanded is a theme with app icons, settings icons, and a dock based on the neumorphic style of
macOS 11.0 Big Sur, and the iconography of iOS. Use this with Big Sur from alt03b1
(It may be installed as a dependency)
Remove the Music and Files icons from "/Library/Themes/Big Sur.theme/IconBundles/" after installing.
